text: The Isley Brothers are a very successful music group from the northeastern United States. They had many songs in the 1950s through the 2000s. Their songs included "Twist and Shout" and "Contagious". Their music is mixed R&B;, funk and soul. The group is made of six African American brothers. Category:American R&B; bands Category:Musical groups from Ohio Category:Musicians from Cincinnati
title: The Isley Brothers
